header.title: Software Engineer | MS CS @ Northeastern | Python, AWS, Distributed Systems, Microservices

resume.summary: Highly motivated MS CS student at Northeastern University with **4+ years of experience** in **Python** and Java, specializing in **distributed systems**, **microservices**, and **AWS cloud**. Proven ability to **engineer scalable solutions** and **optimize performance** for global platforms. Seeking a Software Engineer Co-op from **Jan-Aug 2026** to apply expertise in **backend development** and **cloud infrastructure**.

skills.items: Python, Java, Go, SQL, JavaScript, TypeScript, C++
Microservices, Distributed Systems, Event-Driven, REST APIs, API Development
AWS (Lambda, SQS, EC2, S3), Kubernetes, Docker, CI/CD, Terraform
Django, Flask, FastAPI, Spring Boot, Node.js, Micronaut
MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis, SQL Optimization
ETL Pipelines, Batch Processing, Asynchronous Processing, Message Queues
Git, GitHub, Agile, TDD, Design Patterns, Code Review

bullets: Engineered **event-driven Python/Java pipeline** for KYC/AML compliance, processing **7.5M+ records** across 180+ countries at **40 records/second**.
Transformed complex XML data to standardized JSON, ensuring **99.9% data integrity** and **35% faster turnaround** for high-priority screening.
Optimized **AWS Lambda-based APIs** and implemented **multi-queue priority routing**, reducing request latency by **40%**.
Enhanced system security by **50%** through **AWS WAF, IAM, TLS integration**, maintaining **99.9% uptime** with zero-downtime migrations.
Mentored 5 junior engineers and collaborated with 7 cross-functional teams, fostering **technical excellence** and **project delivery**.
Developed **high-throughput Python data processing pipelines**, improving system throughput by **3x** through **concurrent execution**.
Automated critical ETL processes, reducing manual interventions by **50%** and enhancing overall **operational efficiency**.
Designed and integrated **microservices** with robust **API orchestration**, reducing data processing latency by **35%** via query optimization.
Implemented comprehensive monitoring, scheduling, and **error-handling frameworks**, improving data extraction accuracy by **20%**.

projects.title: Port Management System
projects.tech: Django, Python, MySQL, Advanced SQL, Dijkstra Algorithm
projects.bullet1: Developed a **Django/Python** maritime logistics platform, implementing **Dijkstra's algorithm in SQL** for optimal pathfinding.
projects.bullet2: Designed a **MySQL database** with 50+ stored procedures and 15+ tables, managing **10K+ port combinations** with sub-second response.

projects.title: Online Examination System
projects.bullet1: Built a **Flask/Python** web-based examination platform with teacher/student portals and **real-time grading**.
projects.bullet2: Integrated **MongoDB** for flexible data storage, enabling efficient question management and **multi-role authentication**.

projects.title: Orion Platform
projects.tech: Go, Kubernetes, Operator SDK, Docker, CRDs
projects.bullet1: Engineered a **Kubernetes Operator in Go** for a PaaS, enabling **single-command application deployment** across environments.
projects.bullet2: Implemented **custom CRDs** and an event-driven reconciliation loop for automated provisioning of **PostgreSQL, Redis, MinIO**.
